text.div:
Results Observation Laboratory - IPS

This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….). Value Set Definition: LOINC { { COMPONENT not containing the word "panel" STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {1} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, H&P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*} } UNION { COMPONENT not ( containing the word "panel" OR starting with "can pronounce" ) STATUS in {ACTIVE} CLASSTYPE in {2} ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both} SYSTEM = ^Patient }} Note: This definition is only partially implemented and the current value set expansion contains more than the expected set of codes, as the required regex filters for the LOINC code system are not currently supported by the terminology service.

Copyright Statement:

This artifact includes content from LOINC®. LOINC codes are copyright Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes (LOINC) Committee. Terms & Conditions in https://loinc.org/license/

  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where STATUS = ACTIVE and CLASSTYPE = 1
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where STATUS = ACTIVE, CLASSTYPE = 2 and SYSTEM = ^Patient

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

name: LabResultsObservationUvIps
title: Results Observation Laboratory - IPS
publisher: Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group
description: This value set includes (at the end) some clinical observations, which may be relevant in a lab report (body weight, temperature ….).  Value Set Definition: LOINC {  {    COMPONENT not containing the word "panel"    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {1}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    CLASS exclude {CHALSKIN, H&P.HX.LAB, H&P.HX, LABORDERS, NR STATS, PATH.PROTOCOLS.*}  }  UNION  {    COMPONENT not ( containing the word "panel" OR starting with "can pronounce" )    STATUS in {ACTIVE}    CLASSTYPE in {2}    ORDER_OBS in {Observation, Both}    SYSTEM = ^Patient  }}  Note: This definition is only partially implemented and the current value set expansion contains more than the expected set of codes, as the required regex filters for the LOINC code system are not currently supported by the terminology service.
